output_data.clarification_question: What was the total face-to-face time spent performing psychotherapy and medication management services for this session? Time documentation is critical for CPT coding.
output_data.suggested_answer: 53 minutes (Standard duration for combined services code 90838)?

primary_code.description: Psychotherapy, 53 minutes or more with E/M service
primary_code.rationale: The provider is established (implied by 'since our last session' and 'Sertraline we started'), prescribing, and performed both psychiatric evaluation/management (dose increase of *Sertraline* for *MDD*) and in-depth psychotherapy (assessment of passive suicidal ideation, guilt, and major life impact). Assuming the session met the 53-minute threshold, 90838 is the most appropriate combined code.

output_data.medical_necessity: Management of *Recurrent Major Depressive Disorder, Moderate (F33.1)*, marked by persistent vegetative symptoms, functional impairment (missed work), early morning awakening, and passive suicidal ideation, necessitating a change in antidepressant dosing.
